html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07162024-06-17GAC
ActUnited Nations Act
SubjectRegulations Amending and Repealing Certain Regulations Made Under the United Nations Act (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations amending and repealing CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE UNITED NATIONS ACT (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to(1) add the inclusion of a provision against self-incrimination in the Iraq Regulations; (2) remove the Minister’s discretion regarding the issuance of certificates; (3) clarify of the terms “working day,” “Minister” and “Security Council” (4) correct inconsistency of language used in the provisions regarding legal proceedings; (5) correct the titles of the Lebanon and Haiti Regulations; and (6) correct discrepancy between French and English regarding the term “armed mercenaries” ; (7) replace the term “Director the Sanctions Policy and Operations Coordination Division of the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development” by ‘Minister”
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0138 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending and repealing CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE UNITED NATIONS ACT (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to(1) add the inclusion of a provision against self-incrimination in the Iraq Regulations; (2) remove the Minister’s discretion regarding the issuance of certificates; (3) clarify of the terms “working day,” “Minister” and “Security Council” (4) correct inconsistency of language used in the provisions regarding legal proceedings; (5) correct the titles of the Lebanon and Haiti Regulations; and (6) correct discrepancy between French and English regarding the term “armed mercenaries” ; (7) replace the term “Director the Sanctions Policy and Operations Coordination Division of the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development” by ‘Minister”
